content: काश्मीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Born in, belonging to, or coming from, Kāshmīra. --राः {%<ab>pl.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of a country or its inhabitants; see कश्मीर also. --राः A sort of grape; see कश्मीर also. --रं {@--1@} Saffron; काश्मीरगंधमृगनाभिकृतांगरागां <ls>Ch. P. 8</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 41</ls>; काश्मीरगौरवपुषामभिसारिकाणां <ls>Gīt. 11</ls>; also <ls n="Gīt.">1</ls> {@--2@} Root of a tree.
